name: To infinity and beyond (ominous2212)
description:
This is my first finished game. 

Survive as long as you can, dodging or destroying the asteroids. Recover shields and improve your laser to increase your chances.

- Control the ship with the mouse.

- Hold down the mouse button to shoot automatically.

Get 100,000 points to win!

Made with Pygame.

Version 1.0 -- Finished project
